definition: physically and emotionally exhausted
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
heart/mind/intention/center/core/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]
entirely/without exception/(literary) to be together/to be alike
weary

sentences.english: But I can tell you that it was physically and emotionally exhausting.
sentences.chinese: 但是我可以告訴你的是，它是一種身心俱疲的過程。

sentences.english: The team was burned out and we decided that it was time to find someone else to carry the torch.
sentences.chinese: 整個團隊已身心俱疲，我們覺得該把火炬傳給旁人了。

sentences.english: Some of the most recent research suggests that a bad night’s sleep can stress the body as well as the mind.
sentences.chinese: 最近的一些研究表明，糟糕的晚間睡眠使身心俱疲。
